mapper.sql: XYDM, GD, BGRQ, BGQBL, BGHBL, GSSJ, ID
mapper.insert: insert into T_JS_GQBG (XYDM, GD, BGRQ, BGQBL, BGHBL, GSSJ, ID) values (#{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bgqbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bghbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_JS_GQBG
XYDM,
GD,
BGRQ,
BGQBL,
BGHBL,
GSSJ,
ID,
#{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID, from T_JS_GQBG where xydm=(select a.hcdw_xydm from t_hcrw a where a.id=#{hcrwId})
mapper.insert: insert into T_JS_BD_GQBG (XYDM, GD, BGRQ, BGQBL, BGHBL, GSSJ, ID,SJLY) values (#{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bgqbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bghbl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},5)
